AiJobRun.name: AiJobRun
AiJobRun.description: Represents an execution instance of an AI job. This object tracks the overall status and manages the lifecycle of the job from initiation to completion.

EndTime.description: The time when the job run ends.

ErrorCode.description: If the job run fails, this field indicates the specific error that occurred.

ErrorMessage.description: Contains a detailed, human-readable message that explains the reason for the job run failure.

Label.description: A user-defined name or label for the job run, which can be used for identification and tracking.

Name.description: A unique, system-generated identifier for the AiJobRun record.

OwnerId.description: The user group that owns the AiJobRun record.

StartTime.description: The time when the job run's status changes to InProgress.

Status.description: Tracks the lifecycle of the job run. Valid values are: New: The job run has been created. ReadyToStart: The job run is ready for the user to initiate processing. Queued: The job run is queued to start. InProgress: The job run is currently processing. Completed: The job run completed. Failed: The job run failed. Aborted: The job run was aborted by the user. Archived: The job run was archived by the user.

Target.description: A metadata field used to specify job-specific details, such as a PromptTemplateId, PromptTemplateName, or ModelId. This provides further context for the job execution.
